Question: Doublepoint CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Doublepoint

CES 2024

-Doublepoint Technologies launches "Wow Mouse" app on Google Play, enabling Android smartwatches to utilize gesture-touch technology and instant Bluetooth connectivity to various devices.

-Features cutting-edge gesture detection algorithm compatible with WearOS smartwatches, introducing Human Interface Device (HID) support for stationary pinch and hold capabilities.

-Pre-orders open for Doublepoint Evaluation Kit, offering advanced gesture detection capabilities, licensable software, and reference design for new device categories.

-The app heralds a new era in human-computer interaction, offering intuitive bridge between users and their devices, showcased at CES 2024.
